snippet: Dancers chose stories, mainly from the Carpathian Mountain region, and the choreographer brought them into the present in this work, which had its New York premiere at Lightbox.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews New York premiere of dance work Other Myths, choreographed and performed by Jonah Bokaer, at Lightbox.
lead_paragraph: Dancers chose stories, mainly from the Carpathian Mountain region, and the choreographer brought them into the present in this work, which had its New York premiere at Lightbox.

headline.main: Review: Jonah Bokaer Plucks ‘Other Myths’ From the Past
headline.print_headline: Inhabiting the Present, but Plucked From the Past
